physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Town Church in Rangoon
 Burma. There is a fence around the church. The entrance is made of three archways. There is an attached tower structure on the right of the church. Behind the church
 there are smaller roofed buildings on the left and right of the photograph.There is an area of empty land in front of the church at the forefront of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Town Church in Rangoon, Burma. There is a fence around the church. The entrance is made of three archways. There is an attached tower structure on the right of the church. Behind the church, there are smaller roofed buildings on the left and right of the photograph.There is an area of empty land in front of the church at the forefront of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
